main.name: Daniel Flores
main.description: that loves to spend my down time learning new technologies and hangin at the beach in Half Moon Bay
main.bio: I am a software engineer from Covina, California. I previously worked at a series A startup in sales and used skills that helped me in that role like communication and being quota driven which I feel will give me a leg up in my software engineering career. Those skills relate because instead of having a quota I will now be focused on shipping product in a timely manner and use my communication skills to help other software engineers understand my decision making process or talk through a technical issue I may be having.

education.description: Completed courses that included: Leadership Communication, Interpersonal Communcation, Political Communication, Nonverbal Communication. Competed as a wrestler for 5 years. I intially walked on with no scholarship, by my senior season, I was named Captain by my peers and earned a healthy scholarship!

testimonials.text: Everybody in this country should learn to program a computer because it teaches you how to think.
Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
